item.title: Stephen add a quote by Anne Frank
item.description: "I can shake off everything as I write; my sorrows disappear, my courage is reborn." -- Anne Frank

item.title: Stephen add a quote by Zora Neale Hurston
item.description: "Love makes your soul crawl out from its hiding place." -- Zora Neale Hurston

item.title: Stephen add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "That which does not kill us makes us stronger." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Stephen add a quote by Alice Walker
item.description: "Everything want to be loved. Us sing and dance and holler, just trying to be loved." -- Alice Walker

item.title: Stephen add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Everybody is a genius. But if you judge a fish by its ability to climb a tree, it will live its whole life believing that it is stupid." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Stephen add a quote by Amy Tan
item.description: "Words to me were magic. You could say a word and it could conjure up all kinds of images or feelings or a chilly sensation or whatever. It was amazing to me that words had this power." -- Amy Tan

item.title: Stephen add a quote by William Faulkner
item.description: "Always dream and shoot higher than you know you can do. Do not bother just to be better than your contemporaries or predecessors. Try to be better than yourself." -- William Faulkner

item.title: Stephen add a quote by Wang Ping
item.description: "when the mind is full, the room ceases to be empty" -- Wang Ping

item.title: Stephen add a quote by St. Augustine of Hippo
item.description: "Because God has made us for Himself, our hearts are restless until they rest in Him." -- St. Augustine of Hippo

item.title: Stephen add a quote by W.E.B. DuBois
item.description: "Either America will destroy ignorance or ignorance will destroy the United States." -- W.E.B. DuBois

item.title: Stephen add a quote by Socrates
item.description: "By all means marry; if you get a good wife, you’ll become happy; if you get a bad one, you’ll become a philosopher." -- Socrates

item.title: Stephen add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "Never, never, never give in!" -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Stephen add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "I am a slow walker, but I never walk back." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Stephen add a quote by Confucius
item.description: "The man who moves a mountain begins by carrying away small stones." -- Confucius

item.title: Stephen add a quote by George Orwell
item.description: "In a time of deceit telling the truth is a revolutionary act." -- George Orwell

item.title: Stephen add a quote by William Penn
item.description: "Time is what we want most,but what we use worst." -- William Penn

item.title: Stephen add a quote by Jimi Hendrix
item.description: "When the power of love overcomes the love of power, the world will know peace." -- Jimi Hendrix

item.title: Stephen add a quote by Virginia Woolf
item.description: "You cannot find peace by avoiding life." -- Virginia Woolf

item.title: Stephen add a quote by Jimi Hendrix
item.description: "Knowledge speaks, but wisdom listens" -- Jimi Hendrix

item.title: Stephen add a quote by Anton Chekhov
item.description: "You have lost your reason and taken the wrong path. You have taken lies for truth, and hideousness for beauty. You would marvel if, owing to strange events of some sorts, frogs and lizards suddenly grew on apple and orange trees instead of fruit, or if roses began to smell like a sweating horse; so I marvel at you who exchange heaven for earth. I don't want to understand you." -- Anton Chekhov

item.title: Stephen add a quote by Anton Chekhov
item.description: "If ever my life can be of any use to you, come and claim it." -- Anton Chekhov

item.title: Stephen add a quote by Anton Pavlovich Chekhov
item.description: "The role of the artist is to ask questions, not answer them." -- Anton Pavlovich Chekhov

item.title: Stephen add a quote by Alexander Pope
item.description: "To err is human, to forgive, divine." -- Alexander Pope

item.title: Stephen add a quote by William James
item.description: "If you can change your mind, you can change your life." -- William James

item.title: Stephen add a quote by Alexander Pushkin
item.description: "I want to understand you, I study your obscure language." -- Alexander Pushkin

item.title: Stephen add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Here lives a free man. Nobody serves him." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Stephen add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Am well. Thinking of you always. Love" -- Albert Camus

item.title: Stephen add a quote by Johann wolfgang von Goethe
item.description: "If I love you, what business is it of yours?" -- Johann wolfgang von Goethe

item.title: Stephen add a quote by Frantz Fanon
item.description: "Mastery of language affords remarkable power." -- Frantz Fanon

item.title: Stephen add a quote by Frantz Fanon
item.description: "In the World through which I travel, I am endlessly creating myself." -- Frantz Fanon
